Body:
template = """
        % if x: #comment
            hi
        % else: #next
            hi
        % endif #end
"""
nodes = Lexer(template).parse()
self._compare(nodes, TemplateNode({}, [Text('\n', (1, 1)), ControlLine('if',
    'if x: #comment', False, (2, 1)), Text('            hi\n', (3, 1)),
    ControlLine('else', 'else: #next', False, (4, 1)), Text(
    '            hi\n', (5, 1)), ControlLine('if', 'endif #end', True, (6, 
    1))]))
